title: Land near Ella for Sale
details: Bandarawela/Badulla Road, near Ella, two adjoining properties for sale. Located half km from the main road 39 perches, flat land, suitable for housing, cultivation or guest house project. The adjoining land is 5 acres in extent presently with various types of fruit and timber trees, suitable for a tea, coffee plantation or cultivation. Both have access to perennial water. To be sold separately. Please contact by phone for appointment to inspect.
